welcome_message_body: Welcome to Batam Centre, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yong Kee Istimewa Soup Seafood
restaurants.description: Yong Kee Istimewa Soup Seafood is a soup spot located in the city.
restaurants.address: Komplek Hup Seng Blok A No.5-8 (Batam Center), Batam, Kepulauan Riau

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Batam.
restaurants.address: Jl. Ahmad Yani (Green Land), Kota Batam, Riau 29000

restaurants.name: Bubur Ayam Bogor Pak Djaja
restaurants.description: Bubur Ayam Bogor Pak Djaja is a breakfast spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: Byza Cafe Grands Prestige
restaurants.description: Byza Cafe Grands Prestige is a café located in the city.
restaurants.address: Mega Mall Batam Centre (Jl. Engku Putri, Teluk Tering), Batam, Kepulauan Riau 29461

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut is a pizzeria located in the city.
restaurants.address: Mega Mall Batam Centre, GF (Jl. Engku Putri, Teluk Tering), Batam, Kepulauan Riau 29461

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hang Nadim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, featuring a unique butterfly garden and serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly budget airlines and featuring a unique automated check-in system.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with a simple registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seletar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Seletar Airport, primarily serving private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paya Lebar Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paya Lebar Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
